interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MoYo Natural Labs 32 oz Refillable Bottles, Empty Travel Containers with Flip Caps, BPA Free HDPE Plastic Squeezable Toiletry/Cosmetics Bottle (Pack of 2, HDPE Translucent White)
Review Date: 2017/01/07
Store: MoYo Natural Labs
Product Description: ['MoYo Natural Labs HDPE plastic bottle 32 OZ with flip cap BPA free, made in the USA and will not leak 32 oz bottle HDPE Translucent White.MoYo Natural Labs HDPE bottles and shampoo containers are built to be re-used often, resisting rot and other chemicals. HDPE creates no harmful emissions during its production or during use.At 32 oz, these squeezable, refillable, leakproof bottles guarantee you are buying the best no leak secure flip cap that stays shut when you need it to.Made of HDPE #2 plastic that\'s designed to last, our 32 oz industrial containers are perfect for all of your liquid toiletries, essential oil and beauty cosmetics. The benefits of HDPE EMPTY SHAMPOO BOTTLE Plastic: - HDPE bottles meet FDA guidelines with long-lasting non-toxic plastic for your empty shampoo bottle. - Feel safe and secure with reusing your bottles over a long period of time. - Large neck making it easy to fill the bottle. - Leak-proof bottle design prevents wasting any of your valuable toiletries. - Perfect for all of your toiletry or food or liquid items that you wish to store as no spill bottles in your luggage. - OUR 32 OZ CONTAINER PROMISE! If these all-purpose industrial bottles from MoYo Natural Labs become compromised or leak in the first year, we\'ll replace your small containers, even if it is your fault. We\'re that confident that you\'ll love your new large 32 oz flip cap bottle and will continue to use MoYo Natural Labs empty liquid dispenser in the future. CLICK the "Add to Cart" button to order the MoYo Natural Labs Flip Top HDPE 32 oz food sauce bottle 32 oz container today!']
Average Rating: 4.0

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** The user maintains a strong focus on hairdressing and beauty tools, consistently exploring versatile accessories that enhance their beauty routines, especially those enhancing hair coloring and highlighting methodologies. The recent purchase of refillable, leak-proof bottles demonstrates a continued interest in functional accessories that complement their beauty practices.

- **Quality Preference:** The user prioritizes professional-grade products and remains willing to positively rate items that meet or exceed quality expectations. Their latest feedback aligns with their discerning taste, highlighting satisfaction with durable and effective products.

- **Rating Behavior:** They consistently rate products based on performance and quality, recently demonstrating heightened appreciation for functional aesthetics. Their review of the new product indicates a preference for items that offer practical benefits along with reliability.

- **Review Style:** The user provides concise and clear feedback, emphasizing genuine satisfaction with product performance and recognizing functional design. Their recent review reflects an appreciation for quality, reinforcing their trend of valuing items that enhance usability while being aesthetically pleasing.

Overall, the user continues to exhibit a deliberate interest in robust beauty tools and accessories, increasingly centered on products that integrate functionality with purposeful design to elevate their beauty regimen experience.
